experiment_info.name: lightweight_ensemble_postprocessing
experiment_info.description: Add minimal ensemble averaging step to production baseline
experiment_info.hypothesis: Integrating ensemble as lightweight postprocessing (not full optimizer rewrite) should fit in budget

baseline.note: OLD BASELINE - see verification run for accurate comparison

informed_by.result: PARTIAL SUCCESS - +0.0305 improvement but 21% over budget
informed_by.key_insight: Ensemble averaging works, but implementation overhead from full optimizer rewrite

tuning_runs.notes: Score matches baseline within noise. 15% timing overhead.
Similar to baseline timing. Score within noise.
Baseline run on same machine - achieves same score without ensemble

conclusion: NEUTRAL - Lightweight ensemble achieves same score as baseline (1.154 vs 1.156, within noise) but ensemble only wins 11-15% of samples. The ensemble step neither helps nor hurts significantly. Not worth the added complexity.
